title: Why choose CryptoTrak?
text: CryptoTrak allows you to efficiently track your favourite cryptocurrency and display realtime data throughout the day.

section.title: Realtime Data
section.content: CryptoTrak is a desktop widget that displays realtime prices of cryptocurrencies giving you up-to-date data on all of your chosen crypto.

section.title: Portfolio Value
section.content: CryptoTrak also allows you to keep track of your portfolio value with easy customization.
